message: Just wanted to get the group started.  Post any questions you have on getting started with AppHosted.
I deployed an app on apphosted, but the static files cannot read, anyone help me?

You can create a "Server Alias" in the Metro admin to whichever directory you want to serve (see http://docs.apphosted.com/metro/app_settings.html#server-aliases for details).  We are creating a tutorial on using django staticfiles, but in short, set STATIC_ROOT='/data/static/' in your settings.py, create an alias in Metro (location: /static, target: <data_dir>/static).  Metro will automatically run "manage.py collectstatic" when you deploy.
